name: RandomFacts
0:
”Alexa, ask Random Facts to tell me something interesting”
”Alexa, ask Random Facts to give me a fact”
”Alexa, ask Random Facts to tell me a fact”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: random facts
des:
Update 1.1 - NEW CATEGORY - FOOD
To get a food fact, ask "Alexa, ask Random Facts to give me a fact about food" 

The alexa skill gives a random fact out of over 100 facts, which is updated weekly with more facts. Topics include food, sports, animals, space, and more! 

This was built using the Fact Sample.
